CustomField.formula: IF(AND( Check_In_Date__c < Next_Month_Start_Date_Formula__c , Check_Out_Date__c > Next_Month_Start_Date_Formula__c ), Next_Month_Start_Date_Formula__c, IF(Check_In_Date__c > Next_Month_End_Date_Formula__c , NULL, Check_In_Date__c))
CustomField.label: Next Month Check In Date Formula
